extracted_playbook.title: Minimize Network Exposure
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure that affected products are not accessible via the Internet by minimizing their network exposure.

extracted_playbook.title: Isolate Affected Products
extracted_playbook.description: Isolate affected products from the corporate network to prevent unauthorized access.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Secure Remote Access
extracted_playbook.description: Use secure methods such as virtual private networks (VPNs) for remote access to affected products.
